headline: Brittany Kilgore on Why Leidos Alumni Shouldn't Hesitate To Reapply
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / November 10, 2025 / "Leidos gave me my first opportunity to work in cybersecurity, and the engineers I joined were very welcoming," says Brittany Kilgore, cybersecurity engineer at Leidos. "I never felt pressure ...
